Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Aayiramperukkuth Thalaivarodum Nooruperukkuth Thalaivarodum Sagala Adhipadhigalodum Aalosanaipanni,

2 isravel Sabaiyaiyellaam Nokki: Ungalukku Sammadhiyum Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Siththamumaayirundhaal, Isravelin Dhesangalilellaam Irukkira Nammudaiya Matra Sagodhararum, Avargalode Thangal Velinilangalil Irukkira Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Nammode Koodumpadikku Naam Seekkiramaai Avargalidaththukku Aalanuppi,
3 namadhu Dhevanudaiya Pettiyaith Thirumba Nammidaththukkuk Konduvaruvomaaga; Savulin Naatkalil Adhaith Thedaadheponom Endraan.
4 indhak Kaariyam Sagala Janaththin Paarvaikkum Semmaiyaayirundhapadiyaal, Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Appadiye Seyvom Endraargal.
5 appadiye Dhevanudaiya Pettiyaik Keeriyaadhyaareemilirundhu Konduvarumpadi, Dhaaveedhu Egipthaichcherndha Seekor Nadhithuvakki Aamaaththin Ellaimattumulla Isravelaiyellaankootti,

6 kerubeengalin Naduve Vaasampannugira Karththaraagiya Dhevanudaiya Naamam Thozhudhukollappadugira Avarudaiya Pettiyai Yoodhaavilirukkira Keeriyaadhyaareemukkaduththa Paalaavilirundhu Konduvarumpadikku, Avanum Isravelar Anaivarum Avvidaththirkupponaargal.
7 avargal Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Abinadhaabin Veettilirundhu Oru Pudhuradhaththinmel Etrikkonduvandhaargal; Oosaavum Agiyovum Radhaththai Nadaththinaargal.

8 dhaaveedhum Sagala Isravelarum Thangal Muzhup Palaththodum Dhevanukkumunbaaga Suramandalangalaiyum Thamburugalaiyum Melangalaiyum Kaiththaalangalaiyum Poorigaigalaiyum Seviththu Magizhchchiyaai Aadippaadinaargal.
9 avargal Keedhonin Kalamattum Vandhapodhu, Maadugal Idarinapadiyinaal, Oosaa Pettiyaip Pidikkath Than Kaiyai Neettinaan.
10 appozhudhu Karththar Oosaavinmel Kobam Moondavaraagi, Avan Thankaiyai Pettiyandaikku Neettinadhinimiththam Avanai Adiththaar; Ange Avan Dhevasamugaththil Seththaan.
11 appozhudhu Karththar Oosaavai Adiththadhinimiththam Dhaaveedhu Visanappattu, Andha Sthalaththirku Innaalmattum Vazhangivarugira Peresoosaa Ennum Perittu,
12 andraiyadhinam Dhevanukku Bayandhu: Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Naan Ennidaththukkuk Konduvaruvadhu Eppadiyendru Solli,
13 pettiyaith Thannidaththil Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththile Konduvaraamal, Adhaik Kiththiyanaagiya Obedhedhominveettile Serththaan.
14 dhevanudaiya Petti Obedhedhomin Veettile Avanidaththil Moondrumaadham Irukkaiyil, Karththar Obedhedhomin Veettaiyum Avanukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Aaseervadhiththaar.
